verses.verse: Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of my salvation,<WH3444> I have cried<WH6817> day<WH3117> and night before you.<WH3915>
Let my prayer<WH8605> enter<WH935> into your presence.<WH6440> Turn<WH5186> your ear<WH241> to my cry.<WH7440>
For my soul<WH5315> is full<WH7646> of troubles.<WH7451> My life<WH2416> draws near<WH5060> to Sheol.<WH7585>
I am counted<WH2803> among those who go down<WH3381> into the pit.<WH953> I am like a man<WH1397> who has no help,<WH353>
set<WH2670> apart among the dead,<WH4191> like the slain<WH2491> who lie<WH7901> in the grave,<WH6913> whom you remember<WH2142> no more.<WH1504> They are cut off from your hand.<WH3027>
You have laid<WH7896> me in the lowest<WH8482> pit,<WH953> in the darkest<WH4285> depths.<WH4688>
Your wrath<WH2534> lies heavily<WH5564> on me.<WH6031> You have afflicted me with all your waves.<WH4867> Selah.<WH5542>
You have taken<WH7368> my friends<WH3045> from<WH7368> me.<WH7896> You have made me an abomination<WH8441> to them.<WH3607> I am confined, and I can't<WH3318> escape.
My eyes<WH5869> are dim<WH1669> from grief.<WH6040> I have called<WH7121> on you daily,<WH3117> Yahweh.<WH3068> I have spread out<WH7849> my hands to you.<WH3709>
Do you show<WH6213> wonders<WH6382> to the dead?<WH4191> Do the dead<WH7496> rise<WH6965> up and praise<WH3034> you?<WH5542> Selah.
Is your loving kindness<WH2617> declared<WH5608> in the grave?<WH6913> Or your faithfulness<WH530> in Destruction?<WH11>
Are your wonders<WH6382> made known<WH3045> in the dark?<WH2822> Or your righteousness<WH6666> in the land<WH776> of forgetfulness?<WH5388>
But to you,<WH3068> Yahweh, I have cried.<WH7768> In the morning,<WH1242> my prayer<WH8605> comes before you.<WH6923>
Yahweh,<WH3068> why do you reject<WH2186> my soul?<WH5315> Why do you hide<WH5641> your face from me?<WH6440>
I am afflicted<WH6041> and ready to die<WH1478> from my youth<WH5290> up.<WH5375> While I suffer your terrors,<WH367> I am distracted.<WH6323>
Your fierce wrath<WH2740> has gone over<WH5674> me.<WH1161> Your terrors have cut me off.<WH6789>
They came around<WH5437> me like water<WH4325> all day<WH3117> long.<WH5362> They completely engulfed me.<WH3162>
You have put lover<WH157> and friend<WH7453> far<WH7368> from me,<WH3045> and my friends into darkness.<WH4285>
